title: Harrowing 2014
body: Alright, it's a whole new year, a whole new harrowing. Let's hope we get more than one Halloween skin this year, yeah? Not too much to ask for, right? I know that Underworld Wukong is going to be one, let's hope this is an upward trend, at LEAST 4 halloween skins. You guys hoping for a specific champion to get a skin or are you afraid to get your hopes up after last year?
